parameters.command:
=INPUT_FILE="/tmp/input_{{ $json.uuid }}.mp4"
OUTPUT_FILE="{{ $json.outputDir }}/{{ $json.uuid }}.mp4"
THUMB_FILE="{{ $json.outputDir }}/{{ $json.uuid }}_thumb.jpg"

# Transcode to H.264/AAC for web compatibility
ffmpeg -y -i "$INPUT_FILE" -c:v libx264 -preset fast -crf 23 -c:a aac -b:a 128k -movflags +faststart "$OUTPUT_FILE" 2>/dev/null

# Generate thumbnail at 1 second
ffmpeg -y -i "$INPUT_FILE" -ss 00:00:01 -frames:v 1 -q:v 2 "$THUMB_FILE" 2>/dev/null

# Cleanup temp file
rm -f "$INPUT_FILE"

echo "done"

parameters.name: X-Webhook-Signature
parameters.value: ={{ require('crypto').createHmac('sha256', $env.WEBHOOK_SECRET || 'n8n-webhook-hmac-secret-change-me').update(JSON.stringify({ jobId: $json.jobId, objectId: $json.objectId, status: 'completed', mediaUrl: '/media/' + $json.uuid + '.mp4', thumbnailUrl: '/media/' + $json.uuid + '_thumb.jpg' })).digest('hex') }}
